title: Update Overseer and Assistant badge colors in Field Service Groups pages

requirements.text:
In `frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProfile.tsx`, update the existing badges that display the labels "Overseer" and "Assistant" so that:
- "Overseer" badges use a black background (#000000 or Tailwind equivalent) with white text.
- "Assistant" badges use a gray background (#6B7280 or #9CA3AF, or Tailwind equivalent) with white text.
Keep the badges the same size, padding, typography, border radius, and general styling as before; only change their background and text colors. Do not change "Elder" or "Ministerial Servant" badge colors.

quotes:
Just update the colors of the existing Overseer and Assistant badges - don't create new pages or components.

Search for "Overseer" and "Assistant" badge styling in those two files and update their colors.

acceptanceCriteria: When a publisher in the group has the Overseer badge, it renders with a black background and white text, with no change in badge sizing/shape other than color.
When a publisher in the group has the Assistant badge, it renders with a gray background and white text, with no change in badge sizing/shape other than color.
Elder and Ministerial Servant badges render exactly as they did before this change.
No new pages or reusable badge components are introduced; changes are limited to styling within `FieldServiceGroupProfile.tsx`.

requirements.text:
In `frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.tsx`, locate any existing UI elements (badges or badge-like elements) used to visually label "Overseer" and/or "Assistant" and update their colors to match:
- Overseer: black background with white text
- Assistant: gray background with white text
Keep sizing/styling the same aside from colors, and do not introduce new pages or components.

quotes:
The pages are:
- frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.tsx (main groups list page)
- frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProfile.tsx (individual group profile page)

The Overseer and Assistant badges already exist on these pages showing group leadership.

acceptanceCriteria: Any existing Overseer/Assistant badges on the Field Service Groups list page render with the specified background/text colors and otherwise unchanged styling.
No Elder/Ministerial Servant badge colors are changed on this page (if present).
No new pages or components are added; updates are limited to `FieldServiceGroups.tsx` styling.

constraints: Do not create new pages or new shared badge components; only update existing styling in the specified page files.
Only change Overseer and Assistant badge background/text colors; do not change badge size, padding, typography, layout, or other role badge colors (Elder / Ministerial Servant).
Use English for any user-facing text (no new user-facing text is expected for this change).
nonGoals: Changing backend data models or APIs.
Restyling other badges (e.g., Elder, Ministerial Servant) or changing any other UI outside the specified pages.
